data.title: Derby City Council
data.meta_description:
Derby City Council | 15,412 followers on LinkedIn. Derby is a proud city, where people are committed to making it the best that it can be. | We're proud of Derby and want to make it an even greater place to live, work and visit – a city which is safe, strong and ambitious: 

Safe - where people are safe and the vulnerable are put first and supported.

Strong - where people work together, can enjoy good health and wellbeing throughout their life and feel that they belong to a thriving community.

Ambitious - where we support our children and young people to achieve their full potential, skills are valued, jobs and businesses are growing and we have the infrastructure to create a city for the future.
data.text:
We have an exciting weekend couple weeks ahead with The Darley Park Weekender, Derby Pride, Tour of Britain and Fastlove. See our Derby LIVE competition to win tickets to see Fairytale of New York. See below👇 🎟 Make sure you have got your ticket for the event of summer, as Darley Park Weekender kicks off on Fri 30 Aug. With 80s Mixtape, Ultimate 90s, or Darley Park Concert, there is plenty to get the party started. Don’t miss out, get your tickets now👉 https://orlo.uk/QBXvC 🚲 If you can’t get enough cycling, catch Derby Lloyds Bank Tour of Britain Men’s Stage as it sets off on Derby Arena on Fri 6 Sep. For the first time the city will play host to the world’s top professionals on the road.👉 https://orlo.uk/hTvf4 🎤 Get ready to sing along to all your favourite George Michael classics with Fastlove - The Tribute to George Michael Join us on Sat 21 Sep at Derby Arena for ultimate George Michael and Wham! Celebration!👉 https://orlo.uk/Kmhgs 🏳️🌈 Derby Pride's annual event at Markeaton Park on Sat 14 Sep, celebrates the culture of the LGBT+ community and brings together the diverse communities in and around Derby.👉 https://orlo.uk/W31KD 🎭 For the first time, local performers, whether graduated or still training, who are interested in treading the boards as part of our Adult Ensemble in Cinderella at Derby Arena, can attend an open audition day. 👉 https://orlo.uk/ybupP ✍️ Have an attempt for FREE at our Derby LIVE competition to win 2 tickets to see Fairytale of New York at Derby Arena on Thu 7 Nov.👉 https://orlo.uk/3yd2E

From train makeovers to social enterprise support and a boost for brownfield housing. There’s plenty of exciting developments in our latest Regen digest.👇 🚅Derby’s favourite train-maker, Alstom , has won a £60m contract to give over 300 CrossCountry Trains Voyager trains a makeover. Head over to the 530012 website for more👉 https://orlo.uk/eauxS 🏙️There’s a new helping hand available to local social entrepreneurs thanks to the new Derby Social Ventures pilot programme. Head over to our Newsroom to find out more👉 https://orlo.uk/iaOpW East Midlands Chamber (Derbyshire, Leicestershire, Nottinghamshire) University of Derby 🏠Nearly 1500 new homes will be springing up on brownfield land across the region, thanks to a boost from East Midlands Combined County Authority , including three schemes in Derby. Head over to the EMCCA website for more👉 https://orlo.uk/iOFFt

Today is GCSE results day! Read on to learn what options are available for those who got their results today as well as the latest career and skills development news! 🏫If you have received your GCSE results, and you didn’t get the results you’d hoped for, or want to explore some options of what to do next, we’ve got some advice to help you make a decision! Read more on our newsroom👉 https://orlo.uk/GFk2r 🎉Derby Homes apprentice becomes the first person to complete ASB Apprenticeship. Renee Beasley, has become the first person in the country to complete the Anti-Social Behaviour and Community Safety Officer Apprenticeship. Read more on Derby Homes news👉 https://orlo.uk/9ToiM 🚗Do you want a career in improving traffic and transport? We currently have an opening for a New Streets Engineer/ Area Manager. The successful candidate will guide, manage and influence the team to ensure the delivery of a range of Traffic and Transportation services. Learn more and apply👉 https://orlo.uk/Pm8L1 🤝Looking for a career change? We are looking for a Senior Manager for the Derby Adult Learning Service. If you are interested in applying, visit our jobs webpage👉 https://orlo.uk/6UPfc 🤔Would you like to work within the legal sector? We are partnering with Right Legal Group to bring a legal customer service recruitment day to Derby! This event includes, on the spot preliminary interviews, skills assessments and the opportunity to speak with the team. Sign up now👉 https://orlo.uk/5yhBQ

Calling all cycling enthusiasts! Following the announcement that the Tour of Britain Men is coming to the EMCCA region on Friday 6 September (Stage 4), this article highlights some of the riders that will be taking part in the six stage men’s race: https://lnkd.in/eVrMtqBK Notable riders include Remco Evenepoel, a double Olympic gold medallist making his debut in the event, and Julian Alaphilippe, a former world champion and 2018 Tour of Britain winner. Ethan Vernon, a Paris 2024 Olympic silver medallist, and Jonas Abrahamsen, a standout from the Tour de France, are also competing. Image credit: SWPix.com

NEW STREETS ENGINEER/AREA MANAGER 📃 We are looking for an enthusiastic person, who like us, is interested in playing a part in the development of the Derby’s transport network within the New Streets Highway Development Control Team within Derby City Councils busy Traffic and Transportation Section, who is determined to make a real, positive change. 💰 Starting at £43,421 - £46,464 a year ⏳ Full time or part time considered. Permanent The post holder will be responsible for the compliance of new developments and alterations to the existing Public Highway (Sections 38 and 278). The post holder will guide, manage and influence the team to ensure the delivery of a range of Traffic and Transportation services. Closing date: 09/09/2024 #TeamDerby #DerbyJobs
